alert.note: Alert for Adams; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:40PM EDT until July 28 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 540 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Aspers, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Weigelstown, Hampton, Lake Meade, Spring Grove, Dover, East Berlin, Aspers, York Airport, Biglerville, York Springs, Heidlersburg and Bendersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
